fieldHint.hint2: Ex: broke college student athlete, new husband.

fieldHint.hint1: "At the time, I was trying to _________."(VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: (Ex: make money online; sell my two houses, etc.)

fields.fieldTitle: What was something *external* blocking you from your desire?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: making only a few dollars a day, and many days I actually lost money; finding a buyer for two houses I owned, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What happened that caused you to finally "hit the wall?"

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Google had changed their algorithms and increased their ad costs; I got a call that I had to be there in 60 days or they would give the job to someone else, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What did "hitting the wall" mean for you here? (NEGATIVE)

fieldHint.hint1: "Hitting the wall in this case meant ________."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: suddenly my little potato gun website was no longer making any money, so I had to   turn it off; if I didn't get those houses sold, I was on the verge of losing out on the opportunity of a lifetime, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: #1 consequence of what hitting the wall meant. (NEGATIVE)

fieldHint.hint1: "And in this case, hitting the wall actually __________."(VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: killed my only source of income; meant I was on the clock to get those houses sold or see my dreams squashed forever, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What was the epiphany "Event" for you?

fieldHint.hint1: "But luckily for me, that's when I _________ and everything changed." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: ran into a friend who told me a secret; picked up and read a book; saw a video; had a brainstorm, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What did this epiphany event reveal to you?

fieldHint.hint1: "From this event I discovered all about _________."(VERB ending in "ING")

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: adding upsells to his products; socially engineering a house sale instead of wasting a ton of money on useless ads. etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What was the big "how to" revealed to you in the epiphany?

fieldHint.hint1: "It was made clear to me how to _______."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: make more money from every customer who came in; get people I knew to refer me to people they knew who might want to buy a house, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What did this big "how to reveal" mean to you?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: all his websites started working again in spite of Google’s increased costs; I could find a buyer without paying 6% to a Realtor, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: The Plan: What was the first thing you planned to do?

fieldHint.hint1: "My plan was to start _______." (VERB ending in :ING:)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: creating sales funnels in other markets that had better potential to make money than the potato gun market; contacting everyone I knew to ask them to help me advertise my house to their friends, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: The Plan: What was the first action you took?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: creating funnels and selling products in the weight loss market; making a list of everyone I knew who lived within a 20 mile radius of my house, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: The Plan: What was the next action you took?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: created and started selling supplements to people who suffered from diabetic neuropathy; started calling those people and letting them know our house was for sale and that we needed their help, etc

fields.fieldTitle: The Plan: What was the final big action you took?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: created funnels in the couponing, dating, and parenting markets, and others; sent everyone a physical flyer with a picture of our house and a stats sheet, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Achievement: When the plan came together, what did you decide?

fieldHint.hint1: "Then, because the plan came together so well, we decided to ______." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: create a platform that would make it really easy for everyone to create sales funnels; create a course that taught everything we learned about how to sell multiple houses yourself, no matter what the market conditions, etc.)

fields.fieldTitle: Achievement: What's the name of the solution you created?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: ClickFunnels, Selling Your Home Alone, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Achievement: What amazing, DREAM outcome did you achieve?

fieldHint.hint1: "Though it sounds almost too good to be true, I can now ________." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: build in an hour—by myself, without any tech people—what used to take me and my team of 8 guys 6–8 weeks, and these funnels run faster and converted way higher; sell any house without an agent, no matter what the price, neighborhood or market conditions, easier and faster than hiring a broker and paying their outrageous commissions, etc.
